iiv.display

Interface ShowPointDisplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GotoPointDialog, ShowPointController, ShowPointDialog, ShowPointDisplayLine, StatusWindowShowPointDisplay

    public interface ShowPointDisplay
    ShowPointDisplay defines methods for displaying values at a voxel location.
    Since:
    iiV1.1
    See Also:
    ShowPointImage, CNUDisplay

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean showPoint(int[] point, double value, double factor, java.lang.String name)
      Displays information about a point.
      boolean showPoint(int[] point, double value, double factor, java.lang.String name, XYZDouble xyzpt, java.lang.String mapName)
      Display information about a point including Talairach coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • showPoint

        boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                  double value,
                  double factor,
                  java.lang.String name)
        Displays information about a point.
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog

      • showPoint

        boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                  double value,
                  double factor,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  XYZDouble xyzpt,
                  java.lang.String mapName)
        Display information about a point including Talairach coordinates.
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        xyzpt - point location in talairach coordinates
        mapName - name of map used convert to talairach coordinates
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog, CoordinateMap
